content: work 1 single_crochet in the next single_crochet work 1 single_crochet in each of the next 3 single_crochet chain 1 turn 5/11 row 4 with size 2 1/2 crochet hook work 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet and chain across end off skirt row 1 with size f crochet hook attach yarn to bottom of top on right side chain 1 work 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet across then change to medium blue and chain 1 turn row 2 with medium blue work 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet across chain 3 turn row 3 work 1 double_crochet in each single_crochet across chain 3 turn row 4 work 1 double_crochet in each double_crochet across at end of the row chain 1 turn row 5 work 3 single_crochet in each double_crochet chain 1 turn row 6 change to light blue with light blue work chain 3 single_crochet in each next single_crochet repeat across end off for headband with size f hook chain 40 work 1 single_crochet in each chain end off finishing weave in all ends attach a button or tiny strips of velcro to back of dress sew on a ribbon rose or trim if desired c connie j pritchett march 2019 set # 19 chelsea doll dress coral pink and orange single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet 6/11 chain chain treble_crochet triple crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch space space skip skip half_double_crochet half_double_crochet knitting worsted coral pink and orange crochet hook size f and size 2 1/2 matching thread and needle tapestry needle small button or velcro ribbon rose opt gauge 4 stitches = 1 inch 4 row = 1 inch top of dress row 1 starting with coral pink and with size f crochet hook chain 15 work 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and each chain chain 1 turn row 2 work 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet chain 1 turn ---- 14 single_crochet row 3 work 1 single_crochet in the next 3 single_crochet then chain 3 skip the next single_crochet work 1 single_crochet in the next single_crochet then work 1 single_crochet in each of the next 3 single_crochet work 1 single_crochet in the next single_crochet then chain 3 skip the next single_crochet then work 1 single_crochet in 7/11 the next single_crochet work 1 single_crochet in each of the next 3 single_crochet chain 1 turn row 4 with size 2 1/2 crochet hook work 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet and chain across end off skirt row 1 with size f crochet hook attach yarn to bottom of top on right side chain 1 work 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet across then change to orange and chain 1 turn row 2 with orange work 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet across chain 3 turn row 3 work 1 double_crochet in each single_crochet across chain 3 turn row 4 work 1 double_crochet in each double_crochet across at end of the row chain 1 turn row 5 work 3 single_crochet in each double_crochet chain 1 turn row 6 change to coral pink with coral pink chain 3 skip
